Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLLayeredTabItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ifc.app.ECTabItem
           |
           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLLayeredTabItem
public class SLLayeredTabItem
extends ECTabItem
Subclass of ECTabItem that applies the stone-texture look in a way where the selected tab appears like it's part of the front surface and the other tabs appear to be behind it. This is used by SLLayeredTabView.
See Also:
SLLayeredTabView, SLButtonTabItem

SLLayeredTabItem()

drawBackground(Graphics, Rect)
Overridden to draw stone-look bezel inside tab bounding rect.

SLLayeredTabItem 
  public SLLayeredTabItem()

drawBackground 
  protected void drawBackground(Graphics g,
                                Rect boundsRect)
Overridden to draw stone-look bezel inside tab bounding rect.
